channel.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
channel.description: World News: TOI brings the latest world news headlines, Current International breaking news world wide. In depth analysis and top news headlines world wide.

image.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: King Charles to visit Southport to pay tribute to knife attack victims
item.description: Britain’s King Charles to visit Southport on Tuesday to pay tribute to the victims and families of a mass stabbing last month. The July 29 attack killed three young girls and injured several others, leading to nationwide riots and unrest fueled by online misinformation, which falsely attributed the attack to an Islamist migrant.​​
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Alexandria Cortez blasts at Trump in a fiery speech at DNC
item.description: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez endorsed Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention, while criticising former President Donald Trump’s economic policies. She praised Harris’s dedication to the working class and highlighted the growing unity in the Democratic Party. Ocasio-Cortez contrasted Trump’s alleged prioritisation of the elite with Harris’s commitment to uplifting ordinary Americans.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Why did Queen Elizabeth II consider Donald Trump ‘very rude’, reveals book
item.description: A recent biography of Queen Elizabeth II by Craig Brown, unveiled the Queen's disapproval of former US President Donald Trump's behavior during his visits to the UK. She found him "very rude" and suggested he had an arrangement with his wife, Melania. The book also highlights the Queen's interactions with other controversial leaders.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Comedian Eric Andre claims racial profiling and humiliation at Melbourne airport
item.description: American comedian Eric Andre reported being racially profiled and searched by sniffer dogs at Melbourne Airport. He shared his experience on Instagram and X, expressing concerns for other travellers of colour. Andre intends to consult a discrimination lawyer and has urged people of colour to be cautious when travelling through Melbourne Airport. The airport is investigating the claims.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Taiwan conducts missile drills at sensitive test site
item.description: Taiwan conducted missile drills at the Jiupeng base, simulating the interception of enemy fighters and munitions, aiming to boost its 'combat effectiveness' against China. The exercises saw the firing of Sky Bow III and US-made Patriot II missiles, with all missiles hitting their targets successfully, marking a significant step in Taiwan's efforts to strengthen its defense capabilities.

item.title: Kevin O'Leary slams 'Kamalanomics' as ‘inflationary and unfeasible’
item.description: Kevin O'Leary criticised Kamala Harris's economic proposals on CNN, especially her plans to ban grocery price gouging and increase affordable housing. He compared these to failed socialist policies and labelled them impractical and inflationary. The Wall Street Journal echoed similar sentiments, likening Harris’s proposals to unsuccessful global price controls.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: What to watch as the Democratic National Convention enters its second day in Chicago
item.description: The Democratic National Convention continued with a focus on Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. Former President Barack Obama and Michelle Obama supported Harris' nomination. Protests related to various social issues and the Israel-Hamas war occurred near the event. Former President Donald Trump held counter-events in battleground states.

item.title: Tropical Storm Gilma strengthens in Pacific, expected to stay offshore
item.description: Tropical Storm Gilma strengthened in the eastern Pacific Ocean, providing relief to coastal residents. By Monday night, no coastal warnings were issued. Positioned 720 miles southwest of Mexico's Baja California peninsula, Gilma showed potential to reach hurricane strength midweek, accompanied by sustained winds of 60 mph. Meanwhile, Hurricane Ernesto caused dangerous rip currents along the US East Coast.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'We're going nowhere': Thai opposition figure says court interventions must stop
item.description: Thailand's Pita Limjaroenrat, banned from politics for 10 years, called for judiciary reforms to end cycles of interventions affecting governance. Despite his popularity, the dissolution of his Move Forward Party and the dismissal of Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin highlighted ongoing political instability in Thailand, dominated by the military and powerful institutions.

item.title: 'Bridging proposal': Blinken says Israel accepts Gaza plan, presses Hamas to agree
item.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu's acceptance of a US "bridging proposal" to resolve disagreements for a Gaza ceasefire. Blinken urged Hamas to agree. The proposal aims to resume stalled ceasefire talks in Qatar. Despite optimism, significant challenges remain, with key issues unresolved over months of negotiation.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Obama, Clinton and... Deja Foxx? Influencers pitch Kamala Harris at DNC
item.description: Kamala Harris, gaining traction in her presidential bid, turned to social media influencers for support at the Democratic National Convention. Over 200 influencers received special access to delegates and studio space, reflecting the campaign's focus on digital outreach. Key influencers will speak at the convention to boost Harris’s momentum as she navigates complex political issues and criticisms.

item.title: Mohammed bin Salman forged king’s sign on Yemen war decree: Ex-official
'Minorities in Bangladesh being forced to resign, threatened to leave country'
British tech giant Mike Lynch among missing after yacht sinks off Sicily
Republicans launch Biden impeachment report - without proof
Blinken: Bibi has agreed to mediators’ truce proposal
Harris super PAC founder says public polls are too optimistic
item.description: Chauncey McLean, president of Future Forward, revealed that their internal polling for Kamala Harris' presidential campaign is less optimistic than public surveys. McLean highlighted close races in key states and emphasized the importance of winning Pennsylvania, North Carolina, or Georgia for Harris to secure the presidency. Public desires for detailed policy positions from Harris were also noted.

item.title: Hasina's minister arrested; 2 more murder cases against deposed PM
'If elected would offer Elon Musk Cabinet role or ... ': Trump
item.description: During a campaign stop, Donald Trump suggested Elon Musk for a key role in his potential future administration. He praised Musk's intelligence, describing him as a 'brilliant guy.' Earlier, the two discussed creating a government efficiency commission. However, Trump's plan to dismantle Biden's EV policies might pose challenges for Tesla, Musk's company.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: All you need to know about DNC: Schedule, speakers and themes
item.description: The Democratic Party convention in Chicago saw Vice-President Kamala Harris accept the presidential nomination, following President Biden's decision not to seek reelection. Minnesota Governor Tim Walz was named as her running mate. Prominent speakers included Barack Obama and Bill Clinton. Key policy proposals focused on economic reforms, healthcare and reproductive rights, aiming to portray a progressive vision for the future.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
